DOC.brief_summary: The study assess disease severity treatment pattern rheumatoid arthritis Eastern European , Middle Eastern , North African country .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Disease Severity Treatment Patterns Rheumatoid Arthritis Eastern Europe , Middle East North African Countries ( P08167 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Confirmed diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis , preferably base upon criterion establish American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) 1987 clinical sign & symptom data obtain previous laboratory instrumental examination , may include limited : Radiography , Blood test Written inform consent , sign participation study . Exclusion Criteria : Refusal participate study Age 18 year
